channel.title: Posts on MY NAME
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on MY NAME

item.description: 0 - NaNoGenMo, or National Novel Generation Month, may sound like a parody of NaNoWriMo at first: write code that generates a novel of 50,000+ words The developer and artist Darius Kazemi started NaNoGenMo [in 2013], when he tweeted out an off-the-cuff idea. “Hey, who wants to join me in NaNoGenMo: spend the month writing code that generates a 50k word novel, share the novel & the code at the end?
